## Problem 1 

Load and tidy dataset: 

```{r}
birthweight = read_csv("./data/birthweight.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(
    babysex = factor(recode(babysex, 
              `1` = "Male", 
              `2` = "Female")), 
    frace = factor(recode(frace, 
              `1` = "White", 
              `2` = "Black",
              `3` = "Asian", 
              `4` = "Puerto Rican", 
              `8` = "Other", 
              `9` = "Unknown")), 
    malform = factor(recode(malform, 
              `0` = "Absent", 
              `1` = "Present")), 
    mrace = factor(recode(mrace, 
              `1` = "White", 
              `2` = "Black",
              `3` = "Asian", 
              `4` = "Puerto Rican", 
              `8` = "Other"))) 

#check for missing values
anyNA(birthweight)
```
